Package com.suganya.utils

Class PageActions

java.lang.Object
com.suganya.utils.PageActions
Direct Known Subclasses:
AmazonCategoryPage, AmazonHamburgerMenuPage, AmazonHomePage, AmazonProductPage
public class PageActions extends Object
Utility class to perform basic operations on WebElement such as Click, SendKeys efficiently
Author:
Suganya Jothiramalingam

  • Method Details

    • clickElement

      protected void clickElement(org.openqa.selenium.By elementName, WaitStrategy waitStrategy)
      Method to find WebElement using Wait Strategy passed as input and perform the click operation
      Parameters:
      elementName - By locator of the WebElement which needs to be clicked
      waitStrategy - WaitStrategy to be applied to find the element on the driver instance

    • sendKeysElement

      protected void sendKeysElement(org.openqa.selenium.By elementName, String text, WaitStrategy waitStrategy)
      Method to find WebElement using Wait Strategy passed as input and perform the SendKeys operation
      Parameters:
      elementName - By locator of the WebElement on which input text needs to be entered
      text - Text value to be entered in the WebElement
      waitStrategy - WaitStrategy to be applied to find the element on the driver instance

    • scrollView

      protected void scrollView(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement elmnt)
      Method to perform the action of scrolling the web page until the element passed as parameter is visible
      Parameters:
      elmnt - Element to be viewed on the page by scrolling

    • switchWindow

      protected void switchWindow()
      Method to switch the window to child window once the new tab is opened

    • checkNoOfElements

      protected int checkNoOfElements(org.openqa.selenium.By by)
      Method to check no. of elements with the By locator passed as parameter
      Parameters:
      by - Locator of the element to be validated for presence
      Returns:
      No. of elements with the provided By locator

    • getListFromElement

      protected List<String> getListFromElement(org.openqa.selenium.By by)
      Method to retrieve the text value present in the list of Web elements
      Parameters:
      by - Common Locator of the WebElements to be retrieved
      Returns:
      List containing the Text values from the Web Elements retrieved
